title: Font for a textbook cover?? Any suggestion?
content:
Hi, this is my first post here.  
I am currently working on a book cover for Pearson Education. It is an accounting book for University students with sustainability or eco-friendly theme.

I'm looking for any suggestion on a typeface that might be suitable? I am a bit bored with my current selection of fonts. So any recommendation will be appreciated!

Thanks  
[=
author: yellowshin

comments.content: Eco-Friendly?! Use Papyrus! It screams Eco-friendly! :D
If you can be more specific with your request you'll get a much better response. For example: "Looking for a sans with a friendly and progressive feel".

Speaking of which, you might want to look at Aller Sans, [http://www.typophile.com/node/51198](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011114300/http:/www.typophile.com/node/51198 "http://www.typophile.com/node/51198")
